cafes.name: Café Delhi Heights
cafes.description: Popular urban café known for its juicy burgers, fusion cuisine, and vibrant ambiance in the heart of Delhi.

cafes.name: Blue Tokai Coffee Roasters
cafes.description: Specialty coffee roastery serving single-origin Indian coffees in a minimalist, artistic space.

cafes.name: Indian Coffee House
cafes.description: Historic café established in 1942, famous for intellectual gatherings, affordable prices, and old-world charm.

cafes.name: Café Madras
cafes.description: Iconic South Indian restaurant serving authentic Udupi and Tamil cuisine since 1940 with perpetual queues outside.

cafes.name: Chaayos
cafes.description: Modern chai café offering customizable tea with 'meri wali chai' concept and Indian snacks in a contemporary setting.

cafes.name: Brahmin's Coffee Bar
cafes.description: No-frills legendary café serving the best idli, vada, and filter coffee in Bangalore since 1965.

cafes.name: Café Lota
cafes.description: Artisanal café serving regional Indian cuisine with contemporary twists in the serene setting of the Crafts Museum.

cafes.name: Irani Café
cafes.description: Traditional Irani café with vintage décor, serving classic bun maska, chai, and Parsi specialties since 1950.

cafes.name: Third Wave Coffee Roasters
cafes.description: Specialty coffee shop with minimalist design, serving single-origin coffees and artisanal food in a cozy atmosphere.

cafes.name: Saravana Bhavan
cafes.description: World-famous South Indian vegetarian restaurant chain known for consistent quality and authentic flavors.

cafes.name: Café Mondegar
cafes.description: Iconic café with Mario Miranda murals, serving continental cuisine and beer with a lively atmosphere since 1932.

cafes.name: Flury's
cafes.description: Historic tearoom and confectionery established in 1927, famous for English breakfast, pastries, and cakes.

cafes.name: Trèsind
cafes.description: Modern Indian fine dining restaurant offering innovative molecular gastronomy with theatrical presentations.

cafes.name: Bukhara
cafes.description: Legendary restaurant serving Northwest Frontier cuisine, famous for its Dal Bukhara and tandoori dishes since 1977.

cafes.name: Café Mysore
cafes.description: Traditional South Indian restaurant serving authentic Karnataka cuisine since 1936 in the heart of Matunga.

cafes.name: Diggin
cafes.description: Charming café with fairy lights, lush greenery, and a European vibe, serving Italian cuisine and desserts.

cafes.name: Mavalli Tiffin Room (MTR)
cafes.description: Historic restaurant established in 1924, famous for inventing the rava idli during World War II rice shortages.

cafes.name: Kala Ghoda Café
cafes.description: Quaint café in Mumbai's art district with minimalist design, organic food, and artisanal coffee in a heritage building.

cafes.name: Kunafa World
cafes.description: Specialty dessert café focusing on authentic kunafa and baklava with various Middle Eastern flavors.

cafes.name: Café Turtle
cafes.description: Charming bookstore café offering a peaceful retreat with books, coffee, and homestyle food in upscale Khan Market.

cafes.name: Theobroma
cafes.description: Beloved bakery chain famous for its brownies, cakes, and pastries with multiple outlets across major Indian cities.

cafes.name: Café Irani Chaii
cafes.description: Authentic Irani café preserving the legacy of Mumbai's Parsi café culture with traditional recipes and décor.

cafes.name: Café Coffee Day
cafes.description: India's largest homegrown coffee chain offering a variety of coffee beverages, food, and a casual meeting space.

cafes.name: Dakshinapan
cafes.description: Authentic South Indian restaurant in Pondicherry serving traditional Tamil and Kerala cuisine in a serene setting.

cafes.name: Farzi Café
cafes.description: Modern Indian bistro with molecular gastronomy techniques, offering traditional dishes with contemporary twists.

cafes.name: The Hole in the Wall Cafe
cafes.description: A perpetually popular spot for hearty English breakfasts, fluffy pancakes, and a cozy, friendly vibe.

cafes.name: Peter Cat
cafes.description: Legendary Kolkata restaurant famous for its Chelo Kebab, served in a classic, dimly lit setting since 1975.

cafes.name: German Bakery
cafes.description: An iconic Pune landmark, this bakery and café is known for its baked goods, healthy meals, and relaxed vibe.

cafes.name: Leopold Cafe
cafes.description: A historic and bustling café established in 1871, popular with tourists and locals for its lively atmosphere and extensive menu.

cafes.name: Artjuna
cafes.description: A tranquil garden café with a bohemian vibe, offering healthy Mediterranean food, yoga classes, and a lifestyle shop.

cafes.name: SodaBottleOpenerWala
cafes.description: A quirky and vibrant café that pays homage to Bombay's Irani cafés, serving authentic Parsi cuisine and street food.

cafes.name: Indian Accent
cafes.description: Globally acclaimed restaurant offering inventive modern Indian cuisine, consistently ranked among the world's best.

cafes.name: Glenary's
cafes.description: An iconic colonial-era establishment with a bakery, café, and bar, offering stunning views of Kanchenjunga.

cafes.name: Kayani Bakery
cafes.description: A legendary Pune institution, famous for its Shrewsbury biscuits, Mawa cakes, and old-world charm since 1955.

cafes.name: The Daily All Day
cafes.description: A trendy, newspaper-themed bistro and bar that transforms from a chill daytime café to a lively nightspot.

cafes.name: Toit
cafes.description: One of Bangalore's most famous brewpubs, known for its fantastic craft beers and lively, sprawling space.

cafes.name: Café Lila
cafes.description: A charming and serene café set in a Portuguese villa by the Baga river, famous for its German specialties.

cafes.name: Karim's
cafes.description: An iconic culinary institution since 1913, serving authentic Mughlai cuisine straight from the imperial kitchens of the Mughal Emperors.

cafes.name: Tunday Kababi
cafes.description: A world-famous eatery from the city of Nawabs, known for its melt-in-the-mouth Galouti kebabs with a secret recipe of 160 spices.

cafes.name: O'Coqueiro
cafes.description: A renowned Goan restaurant famous for its authentic cuisine and the place where serial killer Charles Sobhraj was captured.

cafes.name: Chokhi Dhani
cafes.description: An ethnic village resort offering an immersive Rajasthani cultural experience with folk dances, music, and authentic cuisine.

cafes.name: Vidhyarthi Bhavan
cafes.description: A heritage Bangalore eatery since 1943, celebrated for its crispy, thick Masala Dosa and bustling, old-world atmosphere.

cafes.name: Britannia & Co. Restaurant
cafes.description: An iconic, charmingly eccentric Irani café run by the same family since 1923, famous for its Berry Pulao.

cafes.name: Paradise Biryani
cafes.description: A legendary destination for Hyderabadi Biryani, starting as a small café in 1953 and growing into a global brand.

cafes.name: Kuremal Mohanlal Kulfi Wale
cafes.description: A century-old kulfi shop in Old Delhi, famous for its innovative stuffed fruit kulfis and traditional flavors.

cafes.name: A-one Cocoa
cafes.description: An iconic Ahmedabad spot famous for its thick, rich, and indulgent chocolate drink, simply known as 'Cocoa'.

cafes.name: Tataki
cafes.description: A fine-dining restaurant offering an authentic and contemporary Pan-Asian culinary experience with a focus on Japanese cuisine.

cafes.name: The Yogi Tree
cafes.description: A popular café with stunning views of the Ganga, offering a diverse menu of healthy, vegetarian, and international dishes.

cafes.name: Good Luck Cafe
cafes.description: A legendary Irani café established in 1935, famous for its Bun Maska, Chai, and hearty non-vegetarian fare.

cafes.name: Café des Arts
cafes.description: A bohemian-chic café set in a colonial building, known for its artistic vibe, French pastries, and relaxed courtyard.

cafes.name: The Grand Trunk Road
cafes.description: A themed restaurant that takes you on a culinary journey along the historic GT Road, from Kabul to Kolkata.

cafes.name: Burma Burma
cafes.description: A popular vegetarian restaurant offering an authentic taste of Burmese cuisine in a beautifully decorated setting.

cafes.name: Oh! Calcutta
cafes.description: A fine-dining restaurant celebrating the culinary heritage of Bengal with traditional and zamindari recipes.

cafes.name: Manohar Dairy and Restaurant
cafes.description: A legendary eatery in Bhopal, famous for its vegetarian thalis, sweets, and chaat since 1970.

cafes.name: Dyu Art Cafe
cafes.description: A charming café set in an old house with a courtyard, offering simple food, great coffee, and a space for art.

cafes.name: Keventers
cafes.description: An iconic brand since 1925, revived to serve classic and new-flavored milkshakes in their signature glass bottles.

cafes.name: The Sassy Spoon
cafes.description: A chic and vibrant restaurant with quirky interiors, offering an inventive menu of European cuisine and delightful desserts.

cafes.name: 6 Ballygunge Place
cafes.description: Housed in a restored heritage bungalow, this restaurant is a premier destination for authentic Bengali cuisine.

cafes.name: Fatty Bao
cafes.description: A trendy and vibrant Asian gastrobar known for its delicious baos, sushi, and inventive cocktails.

cafes.name: Pancham Puriwala
cafes.description: A legendary eatery established in the 1840s, serving a simple yet delicious meal of piping hot puris and various bhajis.

cafes.name: Tapri Central
cafes.description: A popular rooftop tea café with a relaxed vibe, offering a huge variety of teas and creative Indian snacks.

cafes.name: Amethyst
cafes.description: A beautiful café set in a restored granary, with a lush garden, boutique, and flower shop, offering a tranquil escape.

cafes.name: Giani's Di Hatti
cafes.description: A legendary spot in Old Delhi since 1956, famous for its rich and creamy Rabri Falooda.

cafes.name: Kiyan, The Roseate
cafes.description: An ethereal fine-dining restaurant set amidst water bodies, offering a magical ambiance and a menu of global cuisines.

cafes.name: The Bombay Canteen
cafes.description: A celebration of India's diverse cuisine, this restaurant reimagines classic dishes with a modern, innovative twist.

cafes.name: Shizusan Shophouse & Bar
cafes.description: A vibrant Asian bistro with a 'shophouse' concept, serving comfort food from across Southeast Asia.

cafes.name: La Plage
cafes.description: A chic and iconic beach shack offering exquisite French cuisine right on Ashwem beach, with a fashion boutique on site.

cafes.name: Aswins Sweets
cafes.description: A famous chain from rural Tamil Nadu, known for its high-quality, traditional sweets and snacks made with pure ingredients.

cafes.name: Thalassa
cafes.description: An iconic cliff-top restaurant offering authentic Greek food, stunning sunset views over the Arabian Sea, and a vibrant party atmosphere.

cafes.name: ITC Kohenur - Golconda Pavilion
cafes.description: A 24-hour fine dining restaurant at ITC Kohenur offering a lavish buffet and a-la-carte menu with Indian and inventive international cuisines.

cafes.name: Ratna Cafe
cafes.description: A legendary establishment since 1948, famous for its iconic sambar, which is served in generous quantities with idlis and dosas.

cafes.name: Naturals Ice Cream
cafes.description: Famous for its fresh fruit ice creams made with real fruits, sugar, and milk, with no artificial flavors or preservatives.

cafes.name: The Corner Courtyard
cafes.description: A beautifully restored 115-year-old colonial house turned into a boutique hotel and restaurant with vibrant, quirky décor.

cafes.name: Laxmi Misthan Bhandar (LMB)
cafes.description: A historic establishment in Jaipur's old city, famous for its traditional Rajasthani sweets and vegetarian cuisine since 1727.

cafes.name: Olive Bar & Kitchen
cafes.description: A stunningly romantic restaurant with a white, pebbled courtyard, offering delicious Mediterranean food under a banyan tree.

cafes.name: Bar Palladio
cafes.description: An incredibly beautiful bar with stunning blue and white interiors, offering Italian cuisine and exotic cocktails in a palace setting.

cafes.name: The Permit Room
cafes.description: A quirky and fun restro-bar that serves creative South Indian fusion food and cocktails inspired by the region.

cafes.name: Koshy's Parade Cafe
cafes.description: An old-world institution in Bangalore, Koshy's has been a meeting point for artists, writers, and thinkers for decades.

cafes.name: Big Chill Cakery
cafes.description: The dessert-focused sibling of the famous Big Chill Cafe, serving some of Delhi's most beloved cakes, pastries, and ice creams.

cafes.name: Platters, Hotel Ashok
cafes.description: The 24-hour coffee shop at the historic Hotel Ashok, known for its extensive buffets and classic hotel dining experience.

cafes.name: Kamat Lokaruchi
cafes.description: A popular highway pitstop known for authentic North Karnataka cuisine served in a rustic, village-like setting.

cafes.name: Agashiye
cafes.description: Located in a heritage hotel, Agashiye (meaning 'on the terrace') offers an authentic Gujarati thali experience in an elegant setting.

cafes.name: Gopal's
cafes.description: A very popular spot in Chandigarh for North Indian vegetarian food, chaat, and a wide variety of Indian sweets.

cafes.name: Bawarchi
cafes.description: An iconic Hyderabad restaurant, renowned for its authentic Dum Biryani, attracting crowds for its consistent and delicious taste.

cafes.name: Kesar Da Dhaba
cafes.description: A legendary, century-old dhaba tucked away in the lanes of Amritsar, famous for its rich, slow-cooked Dal Makhani.

cafes.name: Social
cafes.description: A popular chain that blends work and play, functioning as a co-working space by day and a high-energy bar by night.

cafes.name: Murugan Idli Shop
cafes.description: Originating from Madurai, this chain is famous for its soft, fluffy idlis served with a variety of chutneys and podi.

cafes.name: Kochi Kitchen, Marriott
cafes.description: The all-day dining restaurant at the Marriott Hotel, offering extensive buffets with a mix of local Kerala and international dishes.

cafes.name: Theos
cafes.description: A beloved bakery and café in Noida, renowned for its authentic Italian/French desserts, breads, and chocolates.

cafes.name: Bademiya
cafes.description: An iconic late-night food stall that has evolved into a restaurant, famous for its succulent kebabs and rolls.

cafes.name: Shree Thaker Bhojanalay
cafes.description: A legendary eatery serving unlimited, authentic Gujarati thalis since 1945. Known for its homely taste and vast variety.

cafes.name: Cocoa Tree
cafes.description: A popular, upscale café in Kochi known for its extensive menu of continental dishes, decadent desserts, and vibrant atmosphere.

cafes.name: Indigo Delicatessen
cafes.description: A chic, all-day café with a New York deli vibe, serving delicious European and American comfort food.

cafes.name: Corner House Ice Creams
cafes.description: A legendary Bangalore ice cream parlor, famous for its decadent sundaes, especially the 'Death By Chocolate'.

cafes.name: Smoke House Deli
cafes.description: A beautiful café with unique hand-drawn interiors, offering wholesome European comfort food and artisanal coffee.

cafes.name: Chili's Grill & Bar
cafes.description: An American casual dining chain known for its Tex-Mex cuisine, sizzling fajitas, and handcrafted margaritas.

cafes.name: Bohemians
cafes.description: A stylish restaurant offering a global menu with a special focus on reinvented Bengali dishes and creative cocktails.

cafes.name: United Coffee House
cafes.description: An iconic restaurant since 1942, known for its Victorian-era decor, elaborate menu, and classic coffee.

cafes.name: Rustom's Parsi Bhonu
cafes.description: A celebrated restaurant offering authentic Parsi home-style food in a setting that evokes a traditional Parsi home.

cafes.name: Barbeque Nation
cafes.description: A popular chain known for its live-on-the-table grills, extensive buffet, and lively atmosphere perfect for celebrations.
